pr_title: Updated HashedGenData.pm in CLI to support VO attributes

timeline.bodyText: Even if this is probably the better way, I would change that to 'getVoIds' because other methods are using a singular object for the name instead of plural.
timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyText: You could probably call getResourceIds instead.
timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.message:
Updated HashedGenData.pm in CLI to support VO attributes

- We are now receiving VO id within Resource node and
  we can also get VO attributes from the hashes.
- Removed trailing whitespace, fixed indentation.
